sentences.en: But it appears to have misread the country's mood.
sentences.cn: 但是,抵抗运动似乎误判了宏国的情势.

sentences.en: Don't give people an excuse to misread you.
sentences.cn: 不要给人误读你的理由.

sentences.en: He may be misreading her intentions.
sentences.cn: 他也许误解了她的意图。

sentences.en: He misread'the last train'as'the fast train '.
sentences.cn: 他把‘末班车 ’ 误读成 ‘ 快车 ’ 了.

sentences.en: Her sensitiveness on some points was such that it might have been misread as vanity.
sentences.cn: 对于某些东西,她的感觉都敏锐得会让人误解成她过分卖弄.

sentences.en: His tactlessness showed that he had completely misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 他不能随机应变,这表明他对情势完全误解了.

sentences.en: I had completely misread his intentions.
sentences.cn: 我完全误解了他的意图.

sentences.en: I misread the b flat note on the sheet.
sentences.cn: 我误读了乐谱上的b降半音音符.

sentences.en: I misread the instructions / what the instructions said.

sentences.cn: 我把 Mrs 错看成了Mr.

sentences.en: I think she misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 我想她是错误地估计了形势。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I completely misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我完全看错了形势。

sentences.en: The doctor must have misread the notes.
sentences.cn: 医生一定是看错了记录。

sentences.en: The general misread the enemy's intentions.
sentences.cn: 将军对敌军的意图判断失误.

sentences.en: These warnings completely misread China's intent.
sentences.cn: 这些警告完全误解了中国的本意.

sentences.en: They largely misread the mood of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 他们很大程度上误读了选民的意图。

sentences.en: You couldn't be more mistaken, Alex. You've utterly misread the situation.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯，你真是大错特错，你对局势的判断根本不对。

trans.tran_en: If you misread a situation or someone's behaviour, you do not understand it properly.
